2.dialogue: Both the Human Kingdom and the Demon Kingdom are similar
2.speaker: none

3.dialogue: I don't have any interest in the Demon Kingdom.\I also had nothing to do there, so I sat down in the Human Kingdom.
3.speaker: none

4.dialogue: With the money I receive from the Demon Kingdom\And my part time work I was able to lead a calm life.
4.speaker: none

6.dialogue: 《Please confirm the details above the electricity rate that you have not paid,\Select 'Confirm' or 'Cancel'
6.speaker: none

7.dialogue: If I only didn't have these annoying problems.
7.speaker: none

10.dialogue: Pleased to meet you, adorable master ♥\I’m your supporter, my name is <color=ff9900>Mona</color>♥
10.speaker: mona

12.dialogue: Yes! Master, your application was recently confirmed\To participate in the competition to determine the next <color=ff9900>Demon Lord</color>.
12.speaker: same

13.dialogue: Ah?\What are you talking about? Demon Lord?\Hey, don’t touch my cellphone without my permission!
13.speaker: same

14.dialogue: Don’t you remember?\Master, you just <color=ff9900>Confirmed</color> your entry to the competition on your own.
14.speaker: same

16.dialogue: Now that you say it, I just finished\pressing <color=ff9900>Confirm</color> in the mail that recently arrived…\No, but, wasn’t that an electric bill?
16.speaker: same

17.dialogue: Can I use this room~?\Hehe… I sense the scent of a young boy♥
17.speaker: same

18.dialogue: Hey, don’t lay down without asking!
18.speaker: same

20.dialogue: Well, what does this mean?\What is the Demon Lord competition?
20.speaker: same

21.dialogue: Eeehh~?\Haven’t you been heard of the news at the Demon Kingdom?
21.speaker: same

22.dialogue: Of course not!\After all, I came here because I was fed up of the Demon Kingdom.
22.speaker: same

23.dialogue: Master…\You don’t have any friends, right?
23.speaker: same

24.dialogue: Sh-shut up! I’m not alone!\Of course, and what news?
24.speaker: same

25.dialogue: At the moment, the Demon Lord is involved in a very scandalous festival♥
25.speaker: same

26.dialogue: The actual Demon Lord Luciferro decided to suddenly retire、\And, no one knows where he is.\He fled from his home.
26.speaker: same

28.dialogue: Because of that, the competition to determine the next Demon Lord has started.\You've finished the formalities beforehand to be able to register you without issues, master♥
28.speaker: same

30.dialogue: What are you talking about?\Didn’t you click on 'Confirm' by your own will?
30.speaker: same

31.dialogue: That's different\I have no interest to turn into a Demon Lord!
31.speaker: same

32.dialogue: In that case, let's learn about the Demon Lord competition.\Let's go~♥
32.speaker: same

33.dialogue: Don’t keep talking as if nothing happened!
33.speaker: same

36.dialogue: In that case, master\At the moment everyone underestimates you by saying you are the weakest descendant of all…
36.speaker: same

37.dialogue: I don't care, let them think what they want!
37.speaker: same

38.dialogue: But, now's the time to say goodbye to the title of 'The Weakest'!\To wait for the ideal moment and prepare to fight in the competition of the <color=ff9900>Demon Lord</color>.\Mona will be your special guide!
38.speaker: same

39.dialogue: Even when I wanted to pass the day relaxing at home…
39.speaker: same

40.dialogue: First off, let's resolve that habit of you being a hikikomori!
40.speaker: same
